title: EOS R5 C RF24–105mm F4 L IS USM Lens Kit
description: Compact and lightweight, the EOS R5 C is a true hybrid camera, boasting many of the video formats and features from the Cinema EOS lineup as well as many of the still-imaging capabilities of the EOS R5 camera in a beautifully designed body.
author: Rob Percival

title: EOS 5D Mark IV with Canon Log
description: Compact and lightweight, the EOS R5 C is a true hybrid camera, boasting many of the video formats and features from the Cinema EOS lineup as well as many of the still-imaging capabilities of the EOS R5 camera in a beautifully designed body.
author: Kirill Eremenko

title: EOS R5 C
description: The EOS R5 C is a complete package that offers filmmakers, multimedia journalists, and advanced amateurs a cost-effective 8K, 4K, and FHD video camera to help unlock their creative potential.
author: Tim Buchalka

title: EOS 90D Video Creator Kit
description: No matter where your vlogging adventures take you, capture, share and relive your favorite memories with the EOS 90D Video Creator Kit. Featuring a 45-point cross-type AF system
author: Jaysen Batchelor

title: EOS-1D X Mark III
description: The ultimate EOS is here, making way for a new era in autofocus speed, accuracy and precision – the EOS-1D X Mark III. Offering the highest level of performance an EOS DSLR has ever possessed.
author: Lindsay Marsh

title: EOS Rebel T5i 18-55mm IS STM Lens Kit
description: Photo enthusiasts rejoice! The new flagship of the spectacular Rebel Line, the EOS Rebel T5i, is here to renew your artistic side with amazing imaging features and full-featured functionality.
author: Maximilian Schwarzmüller

title: EOS RP RF 24-240mm
description: The EOS RP and RF 24-240mm F4-6.3 IS USM lens kit is the perfect walk-around camera and lens kit for EOS R series camera owners. This compact and lightweight 10x zoom lens is Ideal for travel,
author: Maximilian Schwarzmüller

title: EOS M5 EF-M 18-150mm
description: Compact. Powerful. Fast. The EOS M5 features the brilliant image quality you can expect from the EOS line of cameras, in a lightweight, portable design with fast autofocus
author: Ben Tristem

title: EOS 5DS R
description: With all the features and capabilities of the EOS 5DS, the EOS 5DS R camera offers the potential for even greater sharpness and fine detail for specialized situations.
author: Imtiaz Ahmad

title: EOS 5D Mark IV
description: The EOS 5D Mark IV Body with Canon Log builds on the powerful legacy of the 5D series, offering amazing refinements in image quality, performance and versatility.
author: Imtiaz Ahmad

title: EOS 6D Mark II
description: For superb performance on the go, the Canon EOS 6D Mark II camera puts full-frame performance into a compact, fully featured DSLR. Its 26.2 Megapixel CMOS sensor and DIGIC 7 Image Processor.
author: Rob Percival

title: EOS 5D Mark IV
description: The EOS 5D Mark IV camera builds on the powerful legacy of the 5D series, offering amazing refinements in image quality, performance and versatility.
author: Brad Traversy
